D

determineBid(BotState, BotState) - Method in class engine.ConstantStrategy
Determines the bid amount to be the pre-determined bid size.
determineBid(BotState, BotState) - Method in class engine.FlipStrategy
If the player has enough cash and a random number is greater than 0.3 (70% chance), the determined bid will be the calculated bid size.
determineBid(BotState, BotState) - Method in class engine.GreedyStrategy
Determines the bid based on the greedy strategy.
determineBid(BotState, BotState) - Method in class engine.InverseGreedyStrategy
Determines the bid based on the current state of the game and the strategy.
determineBid(BotState, BotState) - Method in class engine.MixedStrategy
Determines the bid amount based on a combination of rolling average, standard deviation, and the bid offset.
determineBid(BotState, BotState) - Method in class engine.Strategy
Determines the bid amount based on the states of the player and the opponent.
